content: this pattern has a video tutorial and chart to accompany description beautiful asymmetrical shaped shawl or scarf worked from the small point on one end to the large end material any weight yarn with recommended hook sized up 1-2 sizes for proper drape i used 4mm hook with fingering weight yarn ice yarn cake remix - 1 200 yds clover 6mm hook https //amzn to/3ckvktl like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_for=368849637159916 join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off no code necessary just add to cart and save automatically gauge no gauge necessary abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet tc - treble_crochet skip - skip space - space sts - stitches cluster - cluster stitch special stitches cluster - 3 partial double_crochet in same st yo pull through all loops to close
